pkgmetadata.longdescription: Permutations Tests and Performance Indicator for Zero-Inflated Proportions Response // Permutations tests to identify factor correlated to zero-inflated proportions response. Provide a performance indicator based on Spearman correlation to quantify the part of correlation explained by the selected set of factors. See details for the method at the following preprint e.g.: https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/hal-02936779v3.
